00014 /*!
00015     \brief Contains three simple utility functions leveraged by the WaveformWidget class
00016 */
00017 class MathUtil
00018 {
00019 public:
00020     /*!\brief Returns the maximum of all elements in an array of double-precision floating point values.*/
00021     static double getMax(double* arr)
00022     {
00023         double max = arr[0];
00024 
00025         if(sizeof(arr)/sizeof(double) == 0)
00026             return *arr;
00027         for(int i = 0; i < (int) (sizeof(arr)/sizeof(double)); i++)
00028         {
00029             if(arr[i]>max)
00030                 max = arr[i];
00031         }
00032         return max;
00033     }
00034 
00035     /*!\brief Returns the maximum of all elements in a vector of double-precision floating point values.*/
00036     static double getVMax(vector<double> vec)
00037     {
00038         double max = vec.at(0);
00039 
00040         if(vec.size() == 0)
00041             return vec.at(0);
00042         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); i++)
00043         {
00044             if(vec[i]>max)
00045                 max = vec[i];
00046         }
00047         return max;
00048     }
00049 
00050     /*!\brief Rounds a double-precision floating point value to the nearest integer.*/
00051     static double round(double value)
00052     {
00053       return floor(value + 0.5);
00054     }
00055 
00056 
00057 };
00058 
00059 #endif // MATHUTIL_H
